src:
Top Skor Liga Inggris: Vardy Lewati Aguero dan Abraham
04 Nov 2019, 06:39 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Jamie Vardy puncaki daftar top skor sementara Liga Inggris. (Tim Goode/PA via AP)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Persaingan top skor Liga Inggris semakin memanas. Striker Leicester City Jamie Vardy sukses melewati Sergio Aguero (Manchester City) dan Tammy Abraham (Chelsea).Vardy kini berada di posisi teratas daftar pencetak gol terbanyak Premier League dengan koleksi 10 gol. Penyerang asal Inggris itu unggul satu gol dari Aguero dan Abraham.Vardy menyumbang satu gol saat Leicester mengalahkan Crystal Palace 2-0 di Stadion Selhust Park. Gol Vardy tercipta melalui tembakan first time memanfaatkan umpan Demarai Gray.Kemenangan atas Palace mengantar Leicester kembali ke peringkat tiga klasemen Liga Inggris dengan 23 poin, menggeser Chelsea yang harus kembali turun ke posisi empat dengan poin sama tetapi kalah selisih gol.


Jamie Vardy mengalahkan Sergio Aguero dalam perburuan top skor Liga Inggris. (Foto: Carl Recine)

Aguero juga menyumbang gol saat City mengalahkan Southampton 2-1. Sergio Aguero berhasil menyempurnakan Kyle Walker di kotak penalti.Abraham juga ikut andil dalam kemenangan Chelsea 2-1 di kandang Watford. Striker asal Inggris itu membuka keunggulan The Blues saat laga baru berusia lima menit.Persaingan Vardy, Aguero, dan Abraham terus memanas. Perolehan gol ketiganya juga bisa digusur Piere Emerick-Aubameyang yang kini mendulang delapan gol.Top Skor Liga Inggris



10 gol: Jamie Vardy (Leicester)9 gol: Sergio Aguero (Manchester City), Tammy Abraham (Chelsea).8 gol: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang (Arsenal)7 gol: Raheem Sterling (Manchester City).6 gol: Teemu Pukki (Norwich City), Harry Kane (Tottenham), Sadio Mane (Liverpool).5 gol: C Wilson (Bournemouth), Marcus Rashford (Man United), Mohamed Salah (Liverpool).4 gol: Ashley Barnes (Burnley), Bernardo Silva (Man City), Mason Mount (Chelsea). (jun)
text:
Premier League Top Scores: Vardy Skip Aguero and Abraham
Nov 04 2019, 06:39 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Jamie Vardy topped the Premier League top scorers list. (Goode / PA team via AP)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - The English League's top score competition is heating up. Leicester City striker Jamie Vardy successfully passed Sergio Aguero (Manchester City) and Tammy Abraham (Chelsea). Vardy is now at the top of the Premier League's top scorer list with a collection of 10 goals. The England striker is one goal ahead of Aguero and Abraham. Vardy contributed a goal as Leicester beat Crystal Palace 2-0 at Selhust Park Stadium. Vardy's goal was created through a first-time shot using Demarai Gray's pass. Victory over Palace led Leicester back to third place in the Premier League standings with 23 points, shifting Chelsea who had to go back down to fourth with the same points but lost on goal difference.


Jamie Vardy defeated Sergio Aguero in the English Premier League top scorer hunt. (Photo: Carl Recine)

Aguero also contributed a goal when City beat Southampton 2-1. Sergio Aguero managed to perfect Kyle Walker in the penalty box. Abraham also took part in Chelsea's 2-1 victory at home to Watford. The England striker opened the Blues' lead when the match was only five minutes old. The competition of Vardy, Aguero and Abraham continued to heat up. The acquisition of his third goal can also be evicted by Piere Emerick-Aubameyang who is now getting eight goals. Top Score Premier League



10 goals: Jamie Vardy (Leicester) 9 goals: Sergio Aguero (Manchester City), Tammy Abraham (Chelsea) .8 goals: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang (Arsenal) 7 goals: Raheem Sterling (Manchester City) .6 goals: Teemu Pukki (Manchester United) Norwich City), Harry Kane (Tottenham), Sadio Mane (Liverpool) .5 goals: C Wilson (Bournemouth), Marcus Rashford (Man United), Mohamed Salah (Liverpool) .4 goals: Ashley Barnes (Burnley), Bernardo Silva ( Man City), Mason Mount (Chelsea). (jun)
